data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Oussama Tannane (Vitesse) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 33, Matus Bero for Vitesse has been booked by Martin Van den Kerkhof and receives a first yellow card.
Lois Openda scores to make it 1-0 at Gelredome.
That's a fine assist from Matus Bero.
In the minute 36, Almelo's Teun Bijleveld has been booked in Arnhem.
Vitesse take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Oussama Darfalou.
Lois Openda with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Martin Van den Kerkhof blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Arnhem.
Frank Wormuth (Almelo) is making a first substitution, with Silvester Van der Water replacing Teun Bijleveld.
In the minute 46, Jeremy Cijntje is on a sub for Sinan Bakis for Almelo.
Lucas Schoofs is replacing Marco Rente for Almelo at Gelredome.
Goal! Oussama Tannane extends Vitesse's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 63, Great play from Oussama Darfalou to set up the goal.
Delano Burgzorg is replacing Adrian Szoke for the away team.
Vitesse make their first substitution with Idrissa Toure replacing Matus Bero.
In the minute 74, The home team has substituted Lois Openda with Armando Broja. Thomas Letsch is thus making his second change.
The home team replace Oussama Darfalou with Daan Huisman.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
Vitesse make their fourth substitution with Hillary Gong replacing Oussama Tannane.
The home team replace Thomas Bruns with Enzo Cornelisse.
